title: Escape to Cedar Lake
description: After overhearing her husband hire a hit on a man Kristin Bradley knows if she doesn't escape she may be next on his list. Fleeing to a small town called Cedar Lake. Kristin hopes to blend in and stay below the radar. But little does she know she would run into the man of her dreams. Moving back to Cedar Lake after years of being away Jake Andrews has all but given up on women, after his ex cheated on him, leaving him broken hearted. A year later, all bets are off when a gorgeous brunette literally runs into him. Just when Kristin feels her life is finally heading in the right direction something happens to turn her world upside down.
author: Sheila Marie Hook
